news.text: Paper submission titled "Mixed Presence Collaboration using Scalable Visualizations in Heterogeneous Display Spaces" was accepted at %%CSCW 2017%% (Computer-Supported Cooperative Work & Social Computing)
I helped develop curriculum and teach at the %%ANL Summer Coding Camp%%, where 26 high school students learned to program Python during a one week bootcamp.
I presented a poster on Future Outlooks for Enabling Interactive Supercomputing Frameworks at the %%Greater Chicago Area Systems Research%% workshop.
I served as a mentor for Argonne's Introduce a Girl to Engineering Day, where 8th grade girls spent the day learing about the STEM careers.
I successfully defended my disseration on %%Data-Intensive Remote Collaboration using Scalable Visualizations in Heterogeneous Display Spaces%%.
